title: Hello, Hi! Problem with the update
body:
I tried to update, something went wrong and the client crashed. I opened it back up and a popup saying, "We have restored this installation to an older version, now we'll try to patch it to the latest version" 

It should try a little harder because when I get into my game it wont scan files or do anything related to updating. I can't go into a lobby or anything like that.

rito pls :(

Thank you!

replies.body:
You might have a combination of security settings and old game files that's failing to properly get you updated.  To start off, run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your settings or antivirus is allowing the patcher to get through.

Once complete, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions or run into issues.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/1kGRRPz6-client-broken


There are a few of us with this issue now.
